synopsis.text: He's just a regular high school student with an unusual quirk: fainting at the sight of girls' underwear. But when Yuuta Iridatsu finds himself in the middle of a bus hijacking and encounters a mysterious superhero, his life takes a bizarre turn. After being separated from his body, Yuuta discovers that his peculiar habit holds the key to an unimaginable power. Guided by a mischievous cat spirit named Chiranosuke, Yuuta must navigate his new spectral existence in the Korai House, home to an eccentric group of residents. But there's a catch: every time Yuuta sees panties, the world edges closer to destruction by an incoming asteroid. To save his friends and the world, Yuuta embarks on a quest to unravel the secrets surrounding the Korai House and a sinister organization bent on global annihilation. Will Yuuta's love for panties ultimately doom humanity or unlock the power to save it? Join Yuuta in the thrilling and hilarious adventure that is Punch Line.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
